results.content: Using alpha version 1 of Bootstrap 5 and as of this writing, alpha 3 is already out with breaking changes and MORE breaking changes are to come. So, wait and take a course on Bootstrap 4.5. Also, not enough emphasis on responsive design, especially on examples creating grids with the old <table> HTML. Author goes really fast through the Bootstrap components, not giving enough design style tips and explanations. All in all, it feels like a rushed course just to claim it uses Bootstrap 5, which isn't even out yet.
results.content_html: Using alpha version 1 of Bootstrap 5 and as of this writing, alpha 3 is already out with breaking changes and MORE breaking changes are to come. So, wait and take a course on Bootstrap 4.5. Also, not enough emphasis on responsive design, especially on examples creating grids with the old HTML. Author goes really fast through the Bootstrap components, not giving enough design style tips and explanations. All in all, it feels like a rushed course just to claim it uses Bootstrap 5, which isn't even out yet.

results.content: The content and pacing was good. Some minor issues like poor audio quality, making heavy use of VS extensions without saying what they were, and the highlighting of the mouse actually made it harder to see the code underneath the mouse. Also would have been improved if provided instructor code (either on GitHub or as a resource on the lecture) to assist in any debugging / use as reference later
results.content_html: The content and pacing was good. Some minor issues like poor audio quality, making heavy use of VS extensions without saying what they were, and the highlighting of the mouse actually made it harder to see the code underneath the mouse. Also would have been improved if provided instructor code (either on GitHub or as a resource on the lecture) to assist in any debugging / use as reference later

results.content: Really good course. The instructor's language is very clear. He makes the concepts clear, the explanation is nice and all the topics are covered in depth. results.content: From someone who has some experience in basic HTML and CSS, learning Bootstrap from its documentary page was slightly difficult. However, this course helped explain the basics of Bootstrap in a very structured, fast and clear way. Repeating certain steps taught from previous lessons (eg. components) helped me to grasp the concept well. I only hoped for more advanced content, such as building a proper website and to teach on using templates. Overall, I would recommend this course to anyone who's new to Bootstrap very much.
results.content_html: From someone who has some experience in basic HTML and CSS, learning Bootstrap from its documentary page was slightly difficult. However, this course helped explain the basics of Bootstrap in a very structured, fast and clear way. Repeating certain steps taught from previous lessons (eg. components) helped me to grasp the concept well. I only hoped for more advanced content, such as building a proper website and to teach on using templates. Overall, I would recommend this course to anyone who's new to Bootstrap very much.

results.content: Overall, a decent project-based way to go over the basic functionality of Bootstrap 5. Sometimes gets caught up in minor design and dummy content creation rather than explaining all of the features of Bootstrap. The videos are recorded in 720p, which makes reading code annoying at best and the pace seems to be targeted for simply watching rather than following along, otherwise lots of pausing is required.
results.content_html: Overall, a decent project-based way to go over the basic functionality of Bootstrap 5. Sometimes gets caught up in minor design and dummy content creation rather than explaining all of the features of Bootstrap. The videos are recorded in 720p, which makes reading code annoying at best and the pace seems to be targeted for simply watching rather than following along, otherwise lots of pausing is required.
